name: War of the Human Tanks - Limited Operations
description: War of the Human Tanks - Limited Operations is the third and final game in the War of the Human Tanks series. Complete difficult missions with pre-assigned resources and face up against even harder opponents!
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows Vista, 7, 8 & 10 Processor: PentiumIII or higher Memory: 512 MB RAM

reviews.review_text: why are there so little reviews for this game i lost both tsubasa and milk before they got to do anything in a mission i don't have any control over the tanks that i have this game is a million times more 'please why don't i have shizuka anymore' than its predecessors
